News_data.content: Manchester United's players are expected to return to training on Wednesday after a Covid-19 outbreak at the Old Trafford club.
News_data.title: Manchester United players set to return to training after Covid-19 outbreak

News_data.content: Reading's Championship game with Luton Town on Saturday is postponed after positive Covid-19 cases at the Berkshire club.
News_data.title: Reading v Luton Town: Championship game off because of Royals' Covid-19 cases

News_data.content: Venues that fail to implement the coronavirus certification scheme could face fines of up to £10,000.
News_data.title: Covid-19 passport enforcement begins in Northern Ireland

News_data.content: Walk-in Covid-19 booster jabs are being made available for the over-30s with immediate effect.
News_data.title: Coronavirus: Booster programme speeded up to deal with Omicron

News_data.content: Chelsea's Ann-Katrin Berger and Drew Spence will miss Thursday's decisive Women's Champions League game at Wolfsburg because of Covid.
News_data.title: Women's Champions League: Chelsea's Berger and Spence miss Wolfsburg trip because of Covid
